<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irsimilarity/irsimilaritycandidate">IRSimilarityCandidate</a></>}>
This is a class that wraps a range of <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructiondata">IRInstructionData</a> from one point to another in the vector of <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructiondata">IRInstructionData</a>, which is a region of the program. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irsimilarity/irsimilaritycandidate/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irsimilarity/irsimilarityidentifier">IRSimilarityIdentifier</a></>}>
This class puts all the pieces of the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructiondata">IRInstructionData</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructionmapper">IRInstructionMapper</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irsimilarity/irsimilaritycandidate">IRSimilarityCandidate</a> together. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irsimilarity/irsimilarityidentifier/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

## Enumerations

### enum  {#af46430106334db52bfa7a4107e53a0bd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum llvm::IRSimilarity::InstrType ">
This represents what is and is not supported when finding similarity in Instructions.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="af46430106334db52bfa7a4107e53a0bda8f7357506e00d8cd0694f948f909865d" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Legal">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="af46430106334db52bfa7a4107e53a0bda16a84ba67d52e1c64fb48ce437b569ab" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Illegal">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="af46430106334db52bfa7a4107e53a0bda47b7bba75c0c242b40fece427c2bfefa" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Invisible">

</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

Legal Instructions are considered when looking at similarity between Instructions.

Illegal Instructions cannot be considered when looking for similarity between Instructions. They act as boundaries between similarity regions.

Invisible Instructions are skipped over during analysis.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/irsimilarityidentifier-h/#l00076">76</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/irsimilarityidentifier-h">IRSimilarityIdentifier.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Functions

### isClose() {#ad7518d710d81c7c4c04cc6a61e7d65bc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::IRSimilarity::isClose (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructiondata">IRInstructionData</a> &amp; A, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructiondata">IRInstructionData</a> &amp; B)</>}>
Compare one <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructiondata">IRInstructionData</a> class to another <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructiondata">IRInstructionData</a> class for whether they are performing a the same operation, and can mapped to the same value.

For regular instructions if the hash value is the same, then they will also be close.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="A">- The first <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructiondata">IRInstructionData</a> class to compare</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="B">- The second <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irsimilarity/irinstructiondata">IRInstructionData</a> class to compare</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
true if <code>A</code> and <code>B</code> are similar enough to be mapped to the same value.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/irsimilarityidentifier-h/#l00314">314</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/irsimilarityidentifier-h">IRSimilarityIdentifier.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/irsimilarityidentifier-cpp/#l00221">221</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/irsimilarityidentifier-cpp">IRSimilarityIdentifier.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
